name: SIBA
description:
Welcome to SIBA the game. Thank you for downloading this game!!

Description of the game:

SIBA is a LAN multiplayer first person shooter game where the players can join in the
host's lobby and start killing each other with the weapon given.

Instructions:

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
TAB for menu
LEFT CLICK to shoot
SHIFT to run

Hosting and Joining:
Host button: hosts the game
Join button: Type the ip adress of the host pc and click join game to join the existing game.
The players must be under same network*
